text: Holly Slept Over is a 2020 American comedy-drama film written and directed by Joshua Friedlander, in his directorial debut. It stars Josh Lawson, Nathalie Emmanuel, Britt Lower, Erinn Hayes, and Ron Livingston. The film was released on video-on-demand platforms on March 3, 2020, by Sony Pictures Home Entertainment. ==Premise== The film follows the relationship struggles of a married couple (Britt Lower and Josh Lawson) trying to conceive, their friends who have lost their spark, and the tension that ensues when an old college roommate (Nathalie Emmanuel) stays over for the weekend. ==Cast== * Josh Lawson as Noel * Nathalie Emmanuel as Holly * Britt Lower as Audrey * Erinn Hayes as Marnie * Ron Livingston as Peter ==Production== Filming took place in October 2017 in Syracuse, New York. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2020 comedy-drama films Category:2020 directorial debut films Category:2020 films Category:American comedy-drama films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:Films shot in New York (state)
title: Holly Slept Over
